statements: SELECT * FROM crops
SELECT crop_name, nitrogen_requirement FROM crops WHERE potassium_requirement > 0.5
SELECT crop_name, phosphorus_requirement FROM crops WHERE nitrogen_requirement < 0.3 ORDER BY crop_name ASC
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE phosphorus_requirement BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5
SELECT crop_name, potassium_requirement FROM crops WHERE nitrogen_requirement > 0.4 ORDER BY potassium_requirement DESC
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, nitrogen_requirement FROM crops WHERE potassium_requirement > 0;
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE nitrogen_requirement BETWEEN 10.5 AND 15.0;
SELECT crop_name, potassium_requirement FROM crops WHERE phosphorus_requirement < 5.0 ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT crop_id, phosphorus_requirement FROM crops WHERE nitrogen_requirement > 20.0 ORDER BY phosphorus_requirement DESC;
SELECT * FROM crops;
SELECT crop_name, nitrogen_req, phosphorus_req, potassium_req FROM crops ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT id, crop_name, nitrogen_req, phosphorus_req, potassium_req FROM crops WHERE nitrogen_req > 2.5;
SELECT * FROM fertilizers WHERE phosphorus_content < 1.0 ORDER BY potassium_content DESC;
SELECT fertilizer_name, nitrogen_content FROM fertilizers WHERE nitrogen_content > 5.0;
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE nitrogen_req > 5 AND potassium_req < 3;
SELECT crop_name, nitrogen_req, phosphorus_req FROM crops WHERE nitrogen_req BETWEEN 1.5 AND 3.5;
SELECT * FROM crops ORDER BY potassium_req DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_crops, AVG(nitrogen_req) AS avg_nitrogen FROM crops WHERE phosphorus_req > 2;
SELECT c.crop_name, f.fertilizer_name FROM crops c JOIN fertilizers f ON c.nitrogen_req < f.nitrogen_content AND c.phosphorus_req < f.phosphorus_content;
SELECT * FROM Crop;
SELECT name, type, optimal_ph FROM Crop WHERE type='Fruit';
SELECT id, name FROM Fertilizer ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM CropFertilization WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT name, price FROM Fertilizer WHERE type='Organic' AND price < 50;
SELECT * FROM Crop;
SELECT id, name, type FROM Crop ORDER BY optimal_ph DESC;
SELECT name, type, recommended_fertilizer FROM Crop WHERE type='Fruit' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT c.name AS CropName, f.name AS FertilizerName, cf.quantity FROM Crop c, Fertilizer f, CropFertilization cf WHERE c.id = cf.crop_id AND f.id = cf.fertilizer_id;
SELECT c.name AS CropName, SUM(f.price) AS TotalPrice FROM Crop c, Fertilizer f, CropFertilization cf WHERE c.id = cf.crop_id AND f.id = cf.fertilizer_id GROUP BY c.name ORDER BY TotalPrice DESC;
SELECT * FROM crops;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM crops WHERE growth_duration > 50;
SELECT nutrient_name, required_amount FROM nutrients WHERE nutrient_type = 'Macro';
SELECT * FROM fertilizers ORDER BY price_per_unit DESC;
SELECT crop_name, nutrient_name, recommended_amount FROM fertilization_plans WHERE crop_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM crops ORDER BY crop_name DESC, growth_duration ASC;
SELECT nutrient_name, nutrient_type, required_amount FROM nutrients WHERE required_amount > 10;
SELECT crop_name, growth_duration FROM crops WHERE crop_type = 'Vegetable' ORDER BY growth_duration DESC;
SELECT f.fertilizer_name, n.nutrient_name, f.price_per_unit FROM fertilizers f JOIN nutrients n ON f.nutrient_id = n.nutrient_id WHERE f.price_per_unit < 5;

SELECT cp.plan_id, c.crop_name, n.nutrient_name, f.fertilizer_name FROM fertilization_plans cp JOIN crops c ON cp.crop_id = c.crop_id JOIN nutrients n ON cp.nutrient_id = n.nutrient_id JOIN fertilizers f ON cp.fertilizer_id = f.fertilizer_id;
SELECT * FROM crops;
SELECT id, name, type FROM nutrients WHERE critical_level > 5.0;
SELECT name, type, cost FROM fertilizers WHERE quantity = 'Limited';
SELECT id, crop_id, nutrient_id, nutrient_level FROM soil_tests ORDER BY nutrient_level DESC;
SELECT crop_id, fertilizer_id, quantity, date FROM fertilization_plans WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM crops ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, type FROM crops WHERE optimal_ph > 6.5 AND type = 'Fruit' ORDER BY optimal_ph DESC;
SELECT c.name AS crop_name, n.name AS nutrient_name FROM crops c JOIN soil_tests st ON c.id = st.crop_id JOIN nutrients n ON st.nutrient_id = n.id WHERE st.nutrient_level > 5.0;
SELECT f.name AS fertilizer_name, fp.quantity FROM fertilizers f JOIN fertilization_plans fp ON f.id = fp.fertilizer_id WHERE f.cost < 100 AND quantity > 10 ORDER BY f.cost ASC, fp.quantity DESC;
SELECT c.name AS crop_name, SUM(fp.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM crops c JOIN fertilization_plans fp ON c.id = fp.crop_id GROUP BY c.name HAVING total_quantity > 100;
